summary: This is an FBI 302 interview report summarizing an interview with an individual (referred to as III) regarding their recollections of Jeffrey Epstein. The interviewee recalls staying in an Epstein apartment, having photos from that time, and learning about Epstein from a cousin. The document is heavily redacted and subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure being investigated. The interviewee recalls staying in his apartment and learning about him from a cousin.

persons.name: III
persons.context: The individual being interviewed by law enforcement. They provided information about staying in Jeffrey Epstein's apartment and having photos from that period.

connections.description: III stayed in Jeffrey Epstein's apartment on the Upper East Side at some point in the past.

events.title: FBI Interview of Witness III
events.description: FBI agents and other officials interviewed individual III in person regarding their recollections of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Prior Interview of Witness III
events.description: A prior interview with III was conducted, notes from which were used to seek clarification during the 08/31/2021 interview.

locations: Interlochen (likely Interlochen Center for the Arts)
keyFacts: A witness (III) recalled staying in Jeffrey Epstein's apartment on the Upper East Side of New York.
The witness stated they still possess physical photos of themselves and possibly others from the time period associated with Epstein.
The witness learned about Epstein from a cousin, who reminded them about the apartment.
The document is an FBI 302 report from an interview conducted on August 31, 2021, and is subject to a protective order restricting distribution.
The interview sought to clarify statements made by the witness in a prior interview on August 30, 2021.
